rules_text:
Devoid [i](This card has no color.)[/i]
Whenever you cast a colorless spell, you may have Warped Manifestation become a 3/2 Eldrazi creature with flying in addition to its other types until end of turn.
{2}{U}: Scry 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)[/i]
